QuestData.Title: The Black Tome
QuestData.Description: I have made a great discovery, $n.$b$bThere is a powerful warlock in the Soul Engine, in possession of a powerful tome. It contains forbidden secrets to summoning the most powerful of demons.$b$bEven the Legion is afraid to call on these fel lords, but now I possess knowledge beyond theirs.$b$bFetch me the tome and I will never want for magic again.
QuestData.CompletionText: The tome! Do you have it?
QuestData.RewardText: Yes... Within these pages lies the secret to true mastery of this power.
